articles.title: India Vaccinates 10 Million In One Day - Channels Television
articles.description: India has given more than 10 million COVID-19 jabs in a single day for the first time, authorities said Saturday, as the South Asian giant bolsters its defences for a predicted new surge. The health ministry said the 10 million landmark was passed on Friday, …
articles.content:

articles.title: No explanation as China's billionaire actress Vicki Zhao blacklisted from Chinese internet - AsiaOne
